entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
